abstract: Alleged sexual abuse victim may testify at sentencing of former Republican House Speaker J Dennis Hastert's hush-money case; Hastert, who pleaded guilty in October 2015 to violating bank laws, reportedly wanted to hide claims that he sexually molested someone.

headline.print_headline: Illinois: Alleged Victim May Testify at Hastert Hearing
headline.main: Illinois: Alleged Victim May Testify at Hastert Hearing

snippet: A person alleged to be a sexual abuse victim could testify next month at former Speaker J. Dennis Hastert’s sentencing in a hush-money case, according to a federal court transcript.
lead_paragraph: A person alleged to be a sexual abuse victim could testify next month at former Speaker J. Dennis Hastert’s sentencing in a hush-money case, according to a federal court transcript.
